Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 16, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Noisy, bombastic DBeat raw punk from the Midwestern wasteland somewhere near the center of the USA. This description should be all that you need to proceed......so proceed.  DISCONNECTED You like to follow the rules...right?
